Package uk.co.zodiac2000.subscriptionmanager.domain.subscriber

Class OidcIdentifier

java.lang.Object
uk.co.zodiac2000.subscriptionmanager.domain.subscriber.OidcIdentifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class OidcIdentifier extends Object implements Serializable
Value object representing an OpenID Connect issuer and a set of claims. The authorization request must satisfy all claims for the specified issuer for the associated subscriber to be identified. Satisfaction of the claims requires all OIDC identifier claims associated with this object to be present in the authorization request.
See Also:

    • OidcIdentifier

      public OidcIdentifier()
      Zero-args constructor for JPA.

    • OidcIdentifier

      public OidcIdentifier(String issuer, Set<OidcIdentifierClaim> oidcIdentifierClaims, Subscriber subscriber)
      Constructs a new OidcIdentifier with the supplied arguments. The oidcIdentifierClaims argument is required to contain at least one member.
      Parameters:
      issuer - the iss claim
      oidcIdentifierClaims - the set of OIDC claims associated with this OIDC identifier
      subscriber - the subscriber that this OidcIdentifier is associated with
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any argument is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the oidcIdentifierClaims set does not contain at least one member

    • claimsSatisfyRequirements

      public boolean claimsSatisfyRequirements(OidcIdentifierRequestDto oidcIdentifierRequest)
      Returns true if the issuer and claims represented by oidcIdentifierRequest match the issuer and claims represented by this OidcIdentifier.
      Parameters:
      oidcIdentifierRequest - a request containing claims submitted by the client
      Returns:
      true if the request meets the requirements of this OidcIdentifier
